设置字符集：

一、编辑器
“Settings”->“Editor”->“Encoding settings”->“Encoding”

Use encoding when opening files: UTF-8

Use this encoding:

As default encoding(bypassing C::B's auto-detection)

二、编译器
“Settings”->“Compiler”->“Compiler settings”->“Other compiler options”

-fexec-charset=GBK
-finput-charset=UTF-8


设置wx全局变量
“Settings”->“Global variables”->“wx”
